title: Woman's Skirt Length
description:
woman\'s skirt length, cotton, indigo dye, African XXc stored in box; dims 60-1/2 x 41\'; stored w/ 85.125.3,9,10
Name of Cloth: Ina Toumouti or \"the cloth for my mother\". Design Name: Sarkoudiou straight lines.  Cloth is a very old type whose alternation of dark and light straight lines is considered very beautiful.
